summary:
Replace Every dragon sounds from attacks to wings flap to death sounds with much fearsom and realistic sounds!
Now Dragon Shouts Included!

LEGACY Version & Update are Available!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][img]http://i.imgur.com/SrvjcL1.png[/img]
[/size] [color=#ff0000] v4.3.0LU (TO BE UPDATED SOON)[/color][size=6]
[/size] [size=6][img]http://i.imgur.com/nRWqywA.jpg[/img]
[/size][/center][center][size=3]Skyrim Immersive Dragon Sounds is a Mod which Replace Every dragon sounds from attacks to wings flap to death sounds with much fearsom and realistic sounds!


[/size]
[quote]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Immersive Dragon Sounds - LEGACY -[/size][/font]
[b][b][color=#efefef][size=3]v[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]4.3.0 -[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=3]LEGACY[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]- CHANGELOG
[/size][/color]
[/b][/b][/quote][/center][center][color=#ff0000][/color][color=#ff0000]
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ff0000]Flyby sounds (Vanilla sounds are just a heavy wind come throw you but now feel like an angry dragon is near with roar effects).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Dragon Breathing sounds (more vicious Breathing).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Wing Swinging and flapping sounds.[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Takeoff into the air (Wings effects With a vicious roaring).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Land Crash Sounds (With dragon pain sounds).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Landing sounds (With vicious roaring).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Injury Sounds (With dragon pain sounds).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]New Idle Sounds.[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Dragon Footsteps Sounds (With vicious angry breathing).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Over +15 new Sky and +13 Distance Roaring Sounds.[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]+3 Obstructed Sounds (With vicious flight roaring).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]+2 Dragon Death Sounds (With dragon pain sounds).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]+3 Dragon Tail Attack Sounds.[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Dragon melee Killcam Sounds (When he kills by grabbing you from your head).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]Dragon Bite Sounds (More vicious).[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]+8 Hardcore vicious Combat sounds.[/color]
[*][color=#ff0000]+16 Dragon fire/Ice breath Sounds.[/color]
[/list][list]
[*][color=#ff0000][/color]
[/list]
[color=#00ff00]NOTE: Uninstall previous version (info on file read me.txt)

[/color]([color=#00ffff]Incompatible with any mods that changes Dragon Sounds[/color])
Thanks to Alex For the ArtWork
[font=Verdana][b][/b][/font][quote][size=3]Immersive Dragon SoundsÂ Preview[/size][/quote]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AQSGNR8.jpg[/img]

[youtube]smw5YIfTLgc[/youtube]


[youtube]VgtcCVdPU90[/youtube]


[youtube]Vb1iWJGLjAI[/youtube]
[img]http://forum.step-project.com/public/style_images/step/logo.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/zQUbKBK.png[/img]
Feel free to tell me if a sound is bothering you and I'll fix it.[/center]

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21706239/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/yiQrD9j.png[/img][/url][/center]
